quote_excerpt: Hearing page lists date/time and witness as AG Pam Bondi.
GovTrack status line shows enacted and signed by President on Nov. 19, 2025.
Public law link for Pub. L. 119-38.
DOJ OPA release states 3.5 million responsive pages publication.
AP says LA28 chair Casey Wasserman is selling his agency after Maxwell email disclosure.
Reuters report says DOJ sent lawmakers a letter on redactions and four names.
AP reports files show Epstein highlighted Nobel-linked access in elite outreach.
AP reports some districts canceled Lifetouch sessions after viral posts tied to Epstein.
AP reports Lutnick acknowledged meeting Epstein before entering government service, contradicting prior denials.
Reuters says DOJ listed hundreds of names and noted context was not included in the letter.
CNN says DOJ listed hundreds of names without context and quoted criticism that this muddied interpretation.
